_comment: Medium configuration with subtree crossover and grow mutation
_comment_profile: Balanced execution with complexity-building approach - subtree crossover maintains structural integrity while grow mutation progressively increases expression sophistication

_comment_crossover_descriptions.subtree: Standard GP subtree crossover - exchanges subtrees between parents

_comment_mutation_descriptions.grow: Extends terminal nodes into more complex subtrees to increase tree complexity

_comment_parameters.max_depth: Standard depth of 6 allows moderate complexity without excessive computation
_comment_parameters.tournament_size: Balanced selection pressure with tournament size 4
_comment_parameters.mutation_prob: Moderate mutation rate to balance grow operations with stability

_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Medium population for balanced exploration vs computation time
_comment_performance_notes.max_generations: Moderate generations allowing thorough search without excessive runtime
_comment_performance_notes.crossover_focus: Subtree crossover provides effective recombination while preserving good building blocks
_comment_performance_notes.growth_strategy: Grow mutation gradually increases complexity, building sophisticated features over generations
_comment_performance_notes.balance: Configuration balances structural preservation with progressive complexity enhancement
